hudson
Interface ExtensionPoint

All Known Subinterfaces:
MatrixAggregatable, TopLevelItem
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractBuild, AbstractMavenProject, AbstractProject, Ant, ArchitectureMonitor, ArtifactArchiver, AuthorizationStrategy, BatchFile, Build, Builder, BuildHistoryWidget, BuildInfoRecorder, BuildTrigger, BuildWrapper, ChangeLogAnnotator, ClockMonitor, CollabNetSVN, CommandInterpreter, CVSRepositoryBrowser, CVSSCM, DiskSpaceMonitor, DynamicLabeler, ExternalJob, ExternalRun, Fingerprinter, FishEyeCVS, FishEyeSVN, FreeStyleBuild, FreeStyleProject, FullControlOnceLoggedInAuthorizationStrategy, GlobalMatrixAuthorizationStrategy, HistoryWidget, HudsonPrivateSecurityRealm, HudsonPrivateSecurityRealm.Details, ItemListener, JavadocArchiver, Job, JobListener, JobListener.JobListenerAdapter, JobProperty, JUnitResultArchiver, LDAPSecurityRealm, LegacyAuthorizationStrategy, LegacySecurityRealm, Mailer, Mailer.UserProperty, MatrixAggregator, MatrixBuild, MatrixConfiguration, MatrixProject, MatrixRun, Maven, MavenArtifactArchiver, MavenBuild, MavenFingerprinter, MavenJavadocArchiver, MavenMailer, MavenModule, MavenModuleSet, MavenModuleSetBuild, MavenReporter, NodeMonitor, NullSCM, OSLabeler, Project, Publisher, ReportCollector, RepositoryBrowser, Run, RunListener, SCM, SCMListener, SCMTrigger, SecurityRealm, Shell, SubversionRepositoryBrowser, SubversionSCM, SurefireArchiver, Sventon, TestResultAggregator, TimerTrigger, Trigger, UserProperty, ViewCVS, ViewJob, ViewSVN, WebSVN, Widget
public interface ExtensionPoint

Marker interface that designates extensible components in Hudson that can be implemented by Plugins.

Interfaces/classes that implement this interface can be extended by plugins. See respective interfaces/classes for more about how to register custom implementations to Hudson.

Author:
Kohsuke Kawaguchi
See Also:
Plugin
